template.s: @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Exo+2:wght@800&display=swap);@font-face{font-family:Termina-Demi;src:url(https://s0.2mdn.net/creatives/assets/4135577/Termina-Demi.woff2) format('woff2'),url(https://s0.2mdn.net/creatives/assets/4135577/Termina-Demi.woff) format('woff');font-weight:400;font-display:swap}.dynamicAdvertContainer{cursor:pointer;line-height:1;width:300px;height:250px;position:absolute;border:#000 solid 1px}.gordons-frame{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%}.logo.dev{animation:none!important}.logo-img{position:absolute;top:193px;left:100px;width:109px;height:46px}.drink-aware{position:absolute;top:-1.5px;left:241px;color:#000;font-weight:700;font-family:'Exo 2',sans-serif;line-height:0}.drink-aware-1{font-size:3px}.drink-aware-2{font-size:4px}.bg{position:absolute;top:6px;left:6px}.bg-img{position:absolute;width:287px;height:178px}.strawberry-img{position:absolute;top:6px;left:247px;width:46px;height:50px}.glass-left-img{position:absolute;width:46px;height:104px;top:67px;left:99.5px}.glass-right-img{position:absolute;width:46px;height:104px;top:67px;left:160px}.bottle-img{position:absolute;width:40px;height:130px;top:119px;left:233px}.main-copy{position:absolute;top:24px;left:96px;font-size:16px;text-align:center;line-height:1.27;letter-spacing:.33px;color:#fff;font-family:Termina-Demi}.main-copy.dev{animation:none!important}.color-white{color:#fff}.color-black{color:#000}.fade-in{animation:fade-in .5s ease-in-out 0s forwards}.slide-in-left-fade-in{animation:slide-in-left .5s ease-in-out 0s forwards,fade-in .5s ease-in-out 0s forwards}.slide-in-right-fade-in{animation:slide-in-right .5s ease-in-out 0s forwards,fade-in .5s ease-in-out 0s forwards}.slide-in-top-fade-in{animation:slide-in-top .5s ease-in-out 0s forwards,fade-in .5s ease-in-out 0s forwards}.slide-in-bottom-fade-in{animation:slide-in-bottom .5s ease-in-out 0s forwards,fade-in .5s ease-in-out 0s forwards}@keyframes fade-in{from{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes slide-in-left{from{transform:translateX(-100px)}to{transform:translateX(0)}}@keyframes slide-in-right{from{transform:translateX(100px)}to{transform:translateX(0)}}@keyframes slide-in-top{from{transform:translateY(-100px)}to{transform:translateY(0)}}@keyframes slide-in-bottom{from{transform:translateY(100px)}to{transform:translateY(0)}}
